あ.english_translation: Ah! / Oh! (exclamation of sudden realization, surprise, or relief)
あ.russian_translation: А! / О! (восклицание: внезапное понимание, удивление, облегчение)

ああ.english_translation: Ah, I see / Now I get it

あげる.english_translation: to give (to a person of equal or lower status)

あそびに行きましょう.english_translation: Let's go visit / Let's go hang out

あった.english_translation: was/were (for inanimate objects in the past)

ありませんでした.english_translation: there was/were not (polite past negative for inanimates)
ありませんでした.russian_translation: не было (вежл. отриц. прош. вр. для неодуш.)

あんな.english_translation: such (a thing/person far from both speaker and listener)

いじめる.english_translation: to bully, to torment, to tease

いた.english_translation: was/were (for animate objects in the past, informal)

いただく.english_translation: to humbly receive (humble equivalent of もらう and 食べる/飲む)

いらっしゃる.english_translation: to be, to go, to come (honorific equivalent of いる, 行く, 来る)

いる.english_translation: to be, to exist (for animate objects)

うかがう.english_translation: to humbly visit or ask (humble equivalent of 行く, 聞く, 尋ねる)

うち.english_translation: one's own home; inside; one's own family

おいでになる.english_translation: to be, to go, to come (honorific equivalent of いる, 行く, 来る)

おかげ.english_translation: thanks to (often for a positive outcome)

おこります.english_translation: to happen, to occur (written with 起こる); to get angry (written with 怒る)

おっしゃる.english_translation: to say, to tell (honorific equivalent of 言う)

おっと.english_translation: Oops! / Whoa! (exclamation of surprise or sudden realization of a mistake)

お見舞い.english_translation: visit to a sick person (with an offering/gift)

かけ.english_translation: to hang, to put on (e.g., glasses, a coat)

かった.english_translation: was/were (past tense of adjectives ending in -i)

かな.english_translation: I wonder if... (informal, often with uncertainty or doubt)

かまう.english_translation: to mind, to care about, to be concerned with

がち.english_translation: tend to, prone to (often negative connotation)

がんばります.english_translation: I will do my best / I will try hard

きじ.english_translation: article, news report; fabric, material; dough, batter

きれいじゃない.english_translation: is not clean / is not pretty

くれる.english_translation: to give (to the speaker or a close person)

けれど.english_translation: but, although (slightly more formal than けど)

こたつ.english_translation: Kotatsu (Japanese heated table with a blanket)

ご.english_translation: honorific prefix (used before Sino-Japanese nouns, like ご飯)
ご.russian_translation: почтительная приставка (перед сущ., напр. ご飯)

ご存じ.english_translation: to know (honorific equivalent of 知っている)

ご存知.english_translation: to know (honorific equivalent of 知っている)

ご覧になる.english_translation: to see, to look (honorific equivalent of 見る)

さっき.english_translation: a short while ago, just now

さんぽします.english_translation: to take a walk, to stroll

ざあざあ.russian_translation: шум ливня, льет как из ведра

しずかじゃなかったです.russian_translation: было не тихо (вежл. отриц. прош. вр.)

した.english_translation: did (informal past tense of する)

しない.english_translation: doesn't/won't do (informal negative of する)

しばらく.english_translation: a while, for a moment, for some time

しませんでした.english_translation: did not do (polite past negative of する)

しよう.english_translation: Let's do (volitional form of する)

じゃなかったです.english_translation: was not (polite past negative for nouns/na-adjectives)

じゃま.english_translation: hindrance, intrusion, being in the way

すると.english_translation: then, thereupon, in response to that

せい.english_translation: nature, character; result of, fault of

せず.english_translation: without doing, instead of doing (formal negative te-form)

そう.english_translation: so, like that; appears to be (used after plain form)

それで.english_translation: and then, thereupon, for that reason

たがる.english_translation: to want to do (used for a third person's desire)

ちっとも.english_translation: not at all, not in the least (used with negative verb)

つく.english_translation: to arrive, to reach; to stick, to attach (intransitive)

である.english_translation: to be, to exist (formal/written equivalent of です)

でございます.english_translation: is/are (very polite equivalent of です)

といい.english_translation: and (used for incomplete lists); it would be good if...
といい.russian_translation: и (в неполном перечислении); было бы хорошо, если...

とか.english_translation: such as, like (used for casual, non-exhaustive examples)

どうですか.english_translation: How is it? / How about that? / What do you think?

どんどん.english_translation: rapidly, increasingly, steadily (e.g., sound of drums/knocking)

なかった.english_translation: was not / did not exist (plain past negative of ある/いる for inanimates)
なかった.russian_translation: не был/была/было (неформ. отриц. прош. вр. для неодуш.)

なくなる.english_translation: to disappear, to be lost; to die (euphemism)

なさる.english_translation: to do (honorific equivalent of する)

なった.english_translation: became, turned into (plain past of なる)

なって.english_translation: becoming, turning into (te-form of なる)

なでます.english_translation: to stroke, to pet, to caress

なの.english_translation: it is that... (used to ask for or give an explanation, informal)
なの.russian_translation: это потому что / не так ли? (неформ. объяснение/вопрос)

なら.english_translation: if (in the case of X, then Y)

なるべく.english_translation: as much as possible, if possible

なるほど.english_translation: I see, that makes sense, indeed

なん.english_translation: what, which (variation of なに, used before certain sounds)

はいります.english_translation: to enter (a place); to go into (a container)

はめ.english_translation: to fit into, to insert; situation, trap

ひきます.english_translation: to pull; to catch (a cold); to play (a stringed instrument)

ひとりぼっち.english_translation: all alone, solitary (often with a sense of loneliness)

へ.english_translation: to, toward, in the direction of (direction particle)

べたべた.english_translation: sticky, clingy (often referring to skin or hands)

まず.english_translation: first of all, to begin with

まま.english_translation: as is, unchanged (e.g., in this state)

みよう.english_translation: Let's see (volitional form of 見る)

もうける.english_translation: to make a profit, to earn

もし.english_translation: if, supposing (used to state a condition)

もらう.english_translation: to receive, to get (from someone of equal or lower status)

や.english_translation: and, and such (used for non-exhaustive lists); roof, shop (suffix)

やっと.english_translation: at last, finally (after effort or waiting)

やっぱり.english_translation: as expected, after all, just as I thought (informal)

やはり.english_translation: as expected, after all, just as I thought (more formal)

やめる.english_translation: to stop, to quit, to give up (by one's own decision)

よくない.english_translation: is not good (plain negative of いい)

よろしい.english_translation: good, fine, acceptable (polite equivalent of いい)

よろしければ.english_translation: if it's alright with you, if you don't mind (polite)
よろしければ.russian_translation: если вам будет удобно, если не возражаете (вежл.)

る.english_translation: ru (verb ending for ru-verbs, used as a classifier/suffix)

ん.english_translation: final 'n' sound; informal question marker / explanation marker

んです.english_translation: The fact is that... / Used for explanation or emphasis (polite)
んです.russian_translation: Дело в том, что... / Используется для объяснения (вежл.)

アクション.english_translation: action (e.g., in a film or game)

オタク.english_translation: otaku (person with an obsessive interest in subcultures, e.g., anime)

ゲート.english_translation: gate (e.g., at an airport or park)

ゼルダ.english_translation: Zelda (name, typically referring to the game character)

パー.english_translation: paper (in rock-paper-scissors); per (e.g., in a percentage)

一日中.english_translation: all day long, throughout the day

一生懸命.english_translation: as hard as one can, diligently, with all one's might

上る.english_translation: to go up, to climb, to ascend

下りる.english_translation: to go down, to descend; to get off (train, bus) (intransitive)

与.english_translation: to give, to provide; and, with (rare/formal use)

中々.english_translation: very; not easily (used with negative verb)

久しぶり.english_translation: for the first time in a long time; Long time no see
久しぶり.russian_translation: давно не виделись; после долгого перерыва

仕方.russian_translation: способ, метод; неизбежность (напр. 仕方がない - ничего не поделаешь)

付く.english_translation: to be attached, to be included, to stick (intransitive)

以上.english_translation: more than, ... and above; that's all, above (formal conclusion)
以上.russian_translation: более, свыше; на этом всё, вышеуказанное

以下.english_translation: less than, ... and below; the following (formal introduction)

伏.english_translation: to lay face down, to bow down, to hide

会える.english_translation: can meet (potential form of 会う)

伝える.english_translation: to convey, to transmit, to tell

伺.english_translation: to humbly visit or ask (humble equivalent of 行く, 聞く, 尋ねる)

何ですか.english_translation: What is it? / Yes? (polite response to a call)

作れる.english_translation: can make, can create (potential form of 作る)

使える.english_translation: can use (potential form of 使う)

使われる.english_translation: to be used (passive form of 使う)

倒.english_translation: to fall down, to collapse, to overthrow

備.english_translation: to equip, to provide for, to prepare

光る.english_translation: to shine, to glitter, to glow (intransitive)

入れて.english_translation: insert, put in (te-form of 入れる)

具合.english_translation: condition, state, how something is (e.g., health, machine)

写す.english_translation: to copy, to transcribe, to photograph

冷える.english_translation: to become cool, to get cold (intransitive)

凄い.english_translation: amazing, great, incredible (also slang for terrible/awful)

刈.english_translation: to cut (hair, grass), to mow, to harvest

別れる.english_translation: to separate, to part (from someone), to break up

刻.english_translation: to engrave, to carve; time, moment

割れる.english_translation: to break, to crack, to split (intransitive)

募.english_translation: to recruit, to collect, to raise (funds)

包む.english_translation: to wrap, to pack, to cover (transitive)

占.english_translation: to occupy, to take over; fortune-telling

参る.english_translation: to humbly go, come, or visit (humble equivalent of 行く, 来る)

双.english_translation: pair, both, twin (used in compound words)

取.english_translation: to take, to pick up, to get

取り替える.english_translation: to exchange, to replace, to switch

受ける.english_translation: to receive, to get; to take (an exam)

召し上がる.english_translation: to eat, to drink (honorific equivalent of 食べる/飲む)

合う.english_translation: to match, to fit, to suit (intransitive)

君.english_translation: you (used toward subordinates, or by men to women/children); honorific suffix (-kun)

告.english_translation: to tell, to inform, to announce

哺.english_translation: to suckle, to nurse, to feed (used in compound words)

営.english_translation: to manage, to run, to operate (a business)

噴.english_translation: to spout, to gush, to erupt

回る.english_translation: to turn, to spin, to go around (intransitive)

固い.english_translation: hard, firm, solid (used for non-flexible objects)

坊.english_translation: boy; monk, priest (used in compound words)

堅.english_translation: hard, solid, firm (used for strength, determination)

塗.english_translation: to paint, to plaster, to spread

塗る.english_translation: to paint, to spread, to put on (e.g., lotion)

塞.english_translation: to block up, to stop up (e.g., nose, traffic)

増える.english_translation: to increase, to grow in number (intransitive)

外し.english_translation: removing, taking off; evasion, getting out of (noun form)

太る.english_translation: to gain weight, to get fat (intransitive)

奮.english_translation: to exert oneself, to be inspired, to cheer up

妖.english_translation: mysterious, bewitching, alluring (used in compound words)

存.english_translation: to exist, to be (used in formal/humble compounds)

安心.english_translation: relief, peace of mind, feeling safe (na-adjective/noun)

官.english_translation: government official, officer (used in compound words)

宣.english_translation: to proclaim, to announce, to declare

家内.english_translation: my wife (humble, used by a man)

寄る.english_translation: to stop by, to drop in; to approach, to gather (intransitive)

寸前.english_translation: just before, on the verge of

小浜.english_translation: Obama (common place name, meaning small beach)

常.english_translation: usual, ordinary, constant (used in compound words)

幌.english_translation: canopy, hood (of a car/cart); screen, cover

引き出す.english_translation: to pull out, to draw out (e.g., money, talent)

弾き.english_translation: playing (a stringed instrument); bouncing back (noun form)

従.english_translation: to follow, to obey, to accompany

復.english_translation: to return, to restore, to recover (used in compound words)

怒る.english_translation: to get angry, to be mad (intransitive)

怖がる.english_translation: to be afraid of, to show fear (transitive/intransitive)
